column5: Some sweet fish there guys! Those two smallies are rediculous!
Have to agree...fall fishing is for PBs.....here are 2 from Novembers past     MY 32" PB WALLEYE      MY PB 42" MUSKY
Here's my pb bass I caught early this fall, hoping to top my pb muskie at 44" with a 50" though!
I'm so pumped for fal fishing today... I had a hard time sleeping... I'm still like a kid on Christmas...
one of my favorites I took a young lad fishing who never caught a pike So that day he catches 5 pike and lands an 8lb Lunker Priceless.

Hope to get out a few more time's this Fall. I managed a largemouth over 5lbs a few weeks ago here in the Kawartha's but even with a couple other largemouth over 5 these last two summers I still haven't been able to beat my 6lb 14oz PB    Comeon Fall fishing!  Ok...had to share the others from this year        Tightlines everybody! Some nice big bass and walleye you have all caught.
great looking fish fellas !!

Some awesome fish in this thread.  .jpg]  Chris Giles with a big 6lb fall smallie. During our annual fall smallie hunt. (next weekend   )  Not his personal best but the fish looks 10lbs in this photo.   Great thread, I love fall photos of big fish. Here is my personal best, a Simcoe 7. I should photoshop out the old sponsor...
There are some serious giants posted in this thread.  What a great read!  Thanks.

Wow, what great fish in this post. First time I have seen the pics from many people's avatars... After seeing all those 50"+ beauties, these might seem small by comparison... but here's 4 of my best, all fall Kawarthas fish.  45" Sept 2004    46" Sept 2011   47" October 2009   47" October 2009 (caught fishing alone)   48" September 2010
A really nice bunch of fish there fellows.I really like the bunch of quality walleye MTP caught.Good for you Mikey.I just dont have anything to brag about this year. Dan
Me too   Me too                                            And last but not least... Big brothers PB at 13 pounds         Come on November...
Not necessarily a PB, but a nice fall musky from a couple years ago on Buckhorn...     Overall, I tend to struggle to find fish in the fall.
Hoping to break the French River PB with a another or one from LSC.
Can't wait to get after the big girls.

I Love Fall fishing!  I bet alot of us here at OFC have got our personal best fish in the fall.  I'd love to see some pics of them.  With every cast you have a chance at setting a new personal best.  This year I am going to try and top my PB smallie.  It's been a couple years since I have been able to put in some serious time on Simcoe in the fall.  Thinking the new XZone Swammer may help me beat my PB gal below.
Not sure if I will ever beat my PB Walleye...but I'm sure going to give it a try!!! 32", 14.5 pounder!    This is one PB I'm hoping to better this fall...a 40.5" Muskie caught on Fishnsled's boat....
nice fishhhhh!!!!! how big is that smallie?! that walleye looks so prehistoric
You guys must have missed the memo.....Fall is hunting season!!   Fishing gear is put away to collect dust till ice up!!  S.
I look like a dumby in this pic, but this one will be tough to beat.  Could be fatter though for a late October fish.  53x23
My son with a couple fall smallies
I think I should go with all you guys and take my underwater camera so we can video your PB fish..and do some fishing....LOL  but really it is a great time to get big fish
Hey Shane I have a back pack carrying case for my shotgun when Im going to fish the river here.Never know when a flock may come by.

Phil - That is a FOOTBALL!! We need to get out there this fall, at the very least put our other plan into gear.  Cliff - We'll work on a bigger musky for ya but after I get a PB walleye.  I too love the fall for fishing, my favourite time of the year. Bring it on!!
Nice fish guys !!! This fall i have 2 goals. beat my PB(and only) Musky, and beat my PB Walleye.I stand a really good chance to do both  Tite lines !
Does mid-September count as fall fishing ??  54.5 inches
Here's two tank smallies I got last year at around this time.    This one won me Big Fish for that Tourny. 4.56 lbs
i think most have seen this one already .... 7lb small mouth from erie
Fall Smallies are alot of fun, here's my PB fall smallie.
WOW..... Heading there sunday ! Pelee island ! Hopefully can get hook into that fishes brother !~
Mid November 2010
Hopin early October can be good to me again...  53.5 x 26
Gotta Love October/November for some of the best fishing of the year! I have a week on the French River coming up in a few weeks...Hoping to go up a few inches on the PB...
those are all really nice fish
You Sure about the length Wayne Just kidding Bud Beauty Ski!!!
Absolutely positive Paul.. measured in the cradle in the water (without pinching the tail), no guesses over the phone later in the week!
Couple of nice browns from late, late fall.
Wayne, let me know when you head out on the big lake, I'd be happy to net anything you catch  :)
OMG True definition of a Footbal
